articles.author: Chris Lunday
articles.title: Europe tiptoes through NATO summit as Trump lands and Iran looms - politico.eu
articles.description: As Trump returns to the NATO table and conflict brews in the Middle East, leaders are hoping unity survives a tightly choreographed summit.
articles.content:
NATO will, in one way or another, reaffirm its support for Kyiv and point to a new Ukraine-NATO Council at the foreign-minister level on Tuesday. | Robin Van Lonkhuijsen/EPA

articles.author: European Academy of Neurology
articles.title: Simple insulin resistance test may also predict cognitive decline in Alzheimer's patients - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Insulin resistance detected by routine triglyceride-glucose (TyG) index can flag people with early Alzheimer's who are four times more likely to present rapid cognitive decline, according to new research presented at the European Academy of Neurology (EAN) Co…
